markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with the [Príncipi](/principi/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Chornu | next = Bounty - Rock-Stomper Rodul | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_02 | guid = 98a7e516-26de-4f16-af14-d3427ff82a54 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Udita hired the Watcher to hunt down [Kuaro](/kuaro/), a Huana captain who helms the junk ship [Kamat o Ngati](/theBiteOfNgati/). There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. ## Walkthrough * Kuaro sails his junk, Kamat o Ngati ("The Bite of Ngati"), around the [Kua o Rikuhu island chain](/kuaORikuhuIslands/) east of [Neketaka](/neketaka/). His ship is fairly well armed, but shouldn't pose a challenge. Return to Udita after the deed is done. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Principi_02.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Kuaro''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Udita hired me to hunt down Kuaro, a Huana captain who helms the junk ship Kamat o Ngati. There's a bounty to claim in exchange for evidence of the captain's death. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Kuaro and take his ship's triumph.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Kuaro sails his junk, Kamat o Ngati, around the Kua o Rikuhu island chain east of Neketaka. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Udita.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Kuaro's bounty is ready to claim. I can check in with Udita at Lifter's Refuge in Dunnage for my reward. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I dealt with Kuaro and claimed the reward for his bounty. |}
